title: Snapped
description: WARNING: This book contains bad language. There are scenes of a sexual nature. There are scenes of extreme violence. Please do not purchase this book if you are easily shocked, disgusted or offended.Are you sick and tired of everyday life?Are you sick and tired of the uncaring and inconsiderate members of society?Are you sick and tired of your boss, your workplace, your workmates, and your job?Roy is sick and tired of his boss.Roy is sick and tired of being pushed around and of being bullied.Roy is sick and tired of being used, abused, yelled at and degraded.Roy is sick and tired of the inconsiderate members of society.Roy is sick and tired.And then Roy snapped.
author: Jason J. Black
